sense.def:
‘Pardon?’
rečemo, če želimo, da nekdo ponovi, kar je pravkar rekel.

seg.quote: ‘How old is she?’—‘Pardon?’—‘I said how old is she?’

sense.def:
Z izrazom
‘I beg your pardon’
se opravičimo, ker smo naredili napako.

seg.quote: It is treated in the sentence as a noun—I beg your pardon—as an adjective.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
pardons someone
, na osebo, ki mu je naredila nekaj slabega, ni več jezen ali je zaradi tega ne kaznuje.

seg.quote: I hope that poor fellow may be pardoned for whatever crime he has committed.
